title: How do you capture a high quality action shot with a Pixel 4 or any Pixel?
content: How is anyone supposed to capture a quality, high resolution, printable photo of their pet or kids without a proper burst mode? It's sad that there is no manual mode or shutter speed preferred mode as it is, but no burst mode at least? Top shot gives you trash, so that isn't an option. Tell me I'm missing something here please...
